title: Wastelands II - More Stories of the Apocalypse
description:
Famine, Death, War, and Pestilence - the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse, the harbingers of Armageddon. These are our guides through the Wastelands.

Wastelands 2: More Stories of the Apocalypse is a new anthology of postapocalyptic literature from some of the most renowned authors in the science fiction, fantasy, and horror genres today, including George R. R. Martin, Hugh Howey, Junot DÃ­az, David Brin, and many more. This eclectic mix of tales explores famine, death, war, pestilence, and harbingers of the biblical apocalypse.

Like its predecessor, Wastelands 2 delves into a bleak landscape to uncover the raw human emotion and heart-pounding thrills at the genre's core.



Written by John Joseph Adams, George R. R. Martin, Junot DÃ­az, Hugh Howey, David Brin, Paolo Bacigalupi, Seanan McGuire
Read by J. Paul Boehmer, Cassandra Campbell, Orson Scott Card, Gabrielle de Cuir, Jamye Grant
Format: MP3
Bitrate: 64 Kbps
Unabridged
